column1: Little Goat Diner////Had breakfast here the other day. Absolutely loved the vibe
column2: sat at a cozy little two top against the wall. Ordered nachos... yes
column3: breakfast was at 11:30. Always on the hunt for some really worth it nachos and these were fantastic! My friend ordered the hash browns which had the perfect
column4: little amount of cheese and this little pig went to China. I had some of all and it was deliciousness! He had to stop me from ordering a bann mi burger as well because my eyes were waaayyy bigger than my stomach. Coffee was excellent
column5: service was excellent. Cannot wait to return... and to visit the Girl and the goat as well!
